sentences.sContent: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.sCn: 我们的寒假放假时间是从一月十六号截至到二月七日。

sentences.sContent: He became the sixteenth, and some say one of the greatest presidents this country ever had.
sentences.sContent_eng: He became the sixteenth, and some say one of the greatest presidents this country ever had.
sentences.sCn: 他荣任第十六届美国总统，有些人说他是本世纪最伟大的总统之一。

words.tran: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
第六十的；六十分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一

trans.tranOther: one of 16 equal parts of something
one of 16 equal parts of something
